ComicInfo.Title: Looking for a Snark
ComicInfo.Summary: Special $1 introduction to the eagerly awaited new hit series starting this October! You were amazed by his Harvey Award-winning run on THE MUPPET SHOW. You thrilled to his run on THOR: THE MIGHTY AVENGER. Now the next great Roger Langridge comic begins as he brings Lewis Carroll's imaginative world to new heights in a side-splitting adventure that can only be explained as... SNARKED! Presenting a fresh and incredibly modern "Langridge" spin on an already-warped classic, the SNARKED epic adventure starts here with a self-contained 8 page story featuring The Walrus and The Carpenter from Through the Looking Glass -- that's right, the same Walrus that inspired the Beatles song "I Am the Walrus" is now in Roger Langridge's merry, mad hands for new All-Ages adventures at KABOOM! This $1 special includes a full issue's worth of back matter that dives deep into the world of SNARKED with an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at the new series. Don't miss this comic book industry event! Buy the $1 issue now, pick up the series in October!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 22:21:28. [CVDB285173]
ComicInfo.Characters: Alice, Baker, Banker, Barrister, Beaver, Bellman, Billiard Marker, Bonnet Maker, Broker of Goods, Butcher, Cheshire Cat, Clyde McDunk, Jabberwocky, Prince Rusty, Queen Scarlet, Red King, Wilburforce J. Walrus
